SELECT * FROM sys_function_list sfl WHERE sfl.id NOT IN ( SELECT scfr.function_id FROM sys_content_function_rel scfr GROUP BY scfr.function_id ) and sfl.tenant_id=${tenantId} AND sfl.deleted = false
AND sfl.function_name LIKE concat('%', concat(#{functionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY sfl.last_updated_date DESC

select cl.id as content_id, fl.id as function_id from SYS_FUNCTION_LIST fl, SYS_CONTENT_FUNCTION_REL cfr , SYS_CONTENT_LIST cl where fl.source_id=cfr.FUNCTION_ID and cfr.CONTENT_ID=cl.source_id and cl.tenant_id=${tenantId}
